item.title: 10 Most Wasted Characters In Spider-Man Movies
item.description: Each of the Spider-Man movies included a swathe of classic Marvel characters, but some classic friends and foes were completely squandered.

item.title: Disney Viewer Sent A Letter Criticizing 1 High School Musical Casting Due To Their Weight
item.description: High School Musical star KayCee Stroh opens up about the backlash she faced over her weight while appearing in the Disney movie trilogy.

item.title: The Mandalorian & Grogu: All Confirmed Cast & Characters (So Far)
item.description: The Mandalorian & Grogu is the next Star Wars movie to hit theaters, the franchise's first since 2019. Here are its entire cast and characters so far.
